Name: FAREWELL SEN
About the game: After hearing a SOS call on the radio Soot stops his car and begins looking for the broadcast station it came from but what he finds is far from what he bargained for. Enjoy this freeware turn based RPG inspired by old handheld games about finding your way through a small town under attack! Make friends, explore environments AND REST THE WICKEDS! Features: Tons of NPC's 3 Different area's Turn based battles A rad soundtrack One set ending
